  • Deprecated Classes 
    Class and Description
    br.com.caelum.vraptor.serialization.HibernateProxyInitializer
    3.5.0, since persistence plugins have their own projects
  • Deprecated Methods 
    Method and Description
    br.com.caelum.vraptor.core.InterceptorStack.addAsNext(Class)
    br.com.caelum.vraptor.view.PageResult.forward()
    As of 3.2, replaced by #forwardTo()
    br.com.caelum.vraptor.view.PageResult.forward(String)
    As of 3.2, replaced by PageResult.forwardTo(String url)
    br.com.caelum.vraptor.serialization.xstream.XStreamJSONSerialization.getHierarchicalStreamDriver()
    Override this method on XStreamBuilderImpl instead. WARN: this method will be ignored!
    br.com.caelum.vraptor.deserialization.XStreamXMLDeserializer.getXStream()
    prefer overriding XStreamBuilder
    br.com.caelum.vraptor.serialization.xstream.XStreamXMLSerialization.getXStream()
    prefer overwriting XStreamBuilderImpl
    br.com.caelum.vraptor.serialization.xstream.XStreamJSONSerialization.getXStream()
    prefer overwriting XStreamBuilder
    br.com.caelum.vraptor.view.HttpResult.movedPermanentlyTo(Class)
    use result.use(status()).movedPermanentlyTo(ClientsController.class).list(); instead
    br.com.caelum.vraptor.view.HttpResult.movedPermanentlyTo(String)
    use result.use(status()).movedPermanentlyTo(url) instead
    br.com.caelum.vraptor.view.PageResult.redirect(String)
    As of 3.2, replaced by PageResult.redirectTo(String url)
